name: Knighthood (itch)
description:
Knighthood is a two dimensional platformer that takes on the narrative of a medieval kingdom which has been overrun by slime.  Our brave hero is tasked with getting back access to the castle and the throne to restore order to the kingdom.  The game calls for you to strategically avoid enemies or destroy them with your sword while preserving health and not getting too sword crazy, and also to collect keys to progress through the levels. 

The controls are the LEFT and RIGHT arrow keys along with the Up arrow key to jump and the SPACE bar to attack with your sword.  Currently controls are only optimized for desktop platforms.

This game was made possible by developer and producer Brian Ressler and artist / designer Benjamin Norman.

Music: Dancing With a Sword by Noon Sol
